docs.summary: Connect external domains to Wix sites.

permissions.name: Manage Domains
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the account's connected domains.

docs.summary:
Creates a `connectedDomain` object and starts the domain connection process.
It may take up to 48 hours for the DNS changes to take effect.


You must pass the relevant Wix account ID in the header of the call. 
You may also pass a Wix site ID in the header.

You can only connect external domains using this endpoint. Domains purchased 
and billed through Wix can't be connected via this endpoint to a Wix site. For those
domains use the [Registered Domains API](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/account-level-apis/registered-domains/introduction)
instead.

You can connect both root domains and subdomains to Wix sites.

The domain can be assigned as a primary domain or a redirect. 
You can read more about [primary and redirected domains](https://support.wix.com/en/article/switching-your-primary-and-redirected-domains).
If you connect a domain as `"PRIMARY"` to a Wix site, the existing primary
domain automatically becomes unassigned.

> __Important:__ This call requires an account level API key and cannot be authenticated with the standard authorization header.

permissions.name: Manage Domains
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the account's connected domains.

params.name: connectedDomainId
params.doc: ID of the connected domain. Identical to the domain name including TLD.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a connected domain.


You must pass the relevant Wix account ID in the header of the call. 

> __Important:__ This call requires an account level API key and cannot be authenticated with the standard authorization header.

permissions.name: Manage Domains
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the account's connected domains.

params.name: connectedDomainId
params.doc:
ID of the connected domain to retrieve setup information for.
Identical to the domain name including TLD.

docs.summary:
Retrieves information for the initial setup of a connected domain.


You must pass the relevant Wix account ID in the header of the call. 

> __Important:__ This call requires an account level API key and cannot be authenticated with the standard authorization header.

examples.title: Retrieve a connected domain setup information.

permissions.name: Manage Domains
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the account's connected domains.

params.name: connectionType
params.doc:
How the domain should be to connected the Wix site.

+ `"UNKNOWN_CONNECTION_TYPE"`: supported only for subdomain.
+ `"POINTING"`: Get domain or subdomain setup by pointing
+ `"NAMESERVERS"`: Get domain setup by nameservers
+ `"HIDDEN"`: supported only for subdomain.

permissions.name: Manage Domains
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the account's connected domains.

params.name: paging.limit
params.doc:
Number of domains to load.

Min: `0`
Max: `100`

params.name: paging.cursor
params.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

You can get the relevant cursor token
from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of up to 100 connected domains.


You must pass the relevant Wix account ID in the header of the call. 

The retrieved domains are sorted by `createdDate` in descending order.

> __Important:__ This call requires an account level API key and cannot be authenticated with the standard authorization header.

examples.title: Retrieve a list of connected domains.

docs.summary: Triggered when a connected domain is deleted.

docs.summary: A `connectedDomain` object holds information about an external domain and its connection to a Wix site.

members.name: id
members.doc: ID of the connected domain. Identical to the domain name including TLD.

members.name: domain
members.doc:
Domain name including TLD.
Both root domains and subdomains are supported.

members.name: connectionType
members.doc:
How the domain is connected to the Wix site. 

+ `"UNKNOWN_CONNECTION_TYPE"`: There is no information about the connection type.
+ `"POINTING"`: The domain is connected by pointing. Wix doesn't manage DNS information. 
+ `"NAMESERVERS"`: The domain is connected by nameservers. Wix manages DNS information. 
+ `"HIDDEN"`: The domain isn't visible to site visitors.

members.name: siteInfo
members.doc:
Information about the site to which the domain is assigned to and whether
it's the primary domain or a redirect.

members.name: suppressNotifications
members.doc:
Whether the site owner receives standard email notifications from Wix about 
the connected domain.

Default: `false`

members.name: dnsPropagationStatus
members.doc:
DNS propagation status.

+ `"UNKNOWN_DNS_PROPAGATION_STATUS"`: There's no information about the domain's DNS propagation status.
+ `"IN_PROGRESS"`: The domain's DNS propagation process has started but hasn't successfully completed yet.
+ `"COMPLETED"`: The domain's DNS propagation process has successfully finished.
+ `"FAILED"`: The domain's DNS propagation process has failed.

members.name: id
members.doc: ID of the site the domain is assigned to.

members.name: assignmentType
members.doc:
Whether the domain is assigned as primary domain or redirect.
Read more about [primary and redirected domains](https://support.wix.com/en/article/switching-your-primary-and-redirected-domains).

+ `"UNKNOWN_ASSIGNMENT_TYPE"`: There's no information about the assignment type.
+ `"PRIMARY"`: The domain is assigned as the primary domain to the Wix site.
+ `"REDIRECT"`: The domain is assigned as a redirect to the Wix site.

members.name: limit
members.doc:
Number of domains to load.

Min: `0`
Max: `100`

members.name: cursor
members.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

You can get the relevant cursor token
from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of domains returned in the response.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Offset that was requested.

members.name: hasNext
members.doc:
Indicates if there are more results after the current page.
 If `true`, another page of results can be retrieved.
 If `false`, this is the last page.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous page in the list of results.

members.name: connectedDomain
members.doc: Domain to connect.

members.name: connectedDomain
members.doc: Connected domain.

members.name: connectedDomainId
members.doc: ID of the connected domain. Identical to the domain name including TLD.

members.name: connectedDomain
members.doc: Retrieved connected domain.

members.name: connectedDomainId
members.doc: ID of the connected domain to delete. Identical to the domain name including TLD.

members.name: paging
members.doc: Cursor paging options.

members.name: pagingMetadata
members.doc: Metadata about the returned list of connected domains.

members.name: connectedDomains
members.doc: Retrieved connected domains.

members.name: connectedDomainId
members.doc: ID of the connected domain. Identical to the domain name including TLD.

members.name: registrar
members.doc:
Information about the external domain registrar including current name
servers.

members.name: dnsRecords
members.doc: dns records according to the connection type

members.name: nameserverRecord
members.doc:
Information about domains connected using nameservers. Available only for
`{"connectionType": "NAMESERVERS"}`.

members.name: pointingRecords
members.doc:
Information about domains connected by pointing.  Available only for
`{"connectionType": "POINTING"}`.

members.name: subdomainRecords
members.doc: Information about subdomains.  Available only for subdomains.

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of the external domain registrar. For subdomains it's the registrar of the root domain.

members.name: nameServers
members.doc:
Values of the current name server records. In case you connect an external
domain using name servers, site owners must replace these current name servers
with the new name servers found in `connectedDomainSetupInfo.nameserverRecord.nsRecord.values`
during the initial domain setup.
The replacement can't be performed through Wix APIs, you must use the
infrastructure of the external domain registrar. Read more about
[connecting domains using nameservers](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/account-level-apis/connected-domains/sample-flows#account-level-apis_connected-domains_sample-flows_connect-an-external-domain-using-nameservers).

members.name: hostName
members.doc: Domain host name. For example `domain.com` or `mail.domain.com`. Can be a subdomain.

members.name: ttl
members.doc: [Time to live](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_to_live) in seconds.

members.name: values
members.doc: DNS record values.

members.name: hostName
members.doc: Domain host name. For example `domain.com` or `mail.domain.com`. Can be a subdomain.

members.name: ttl
members.doc: [Time to live](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_to_live) in seconds.

members.name: value
members.doc: DNS record value.

members.name: hostName
members.doc: Domain host name. For example `domain.com` or `mail.domain.com`. Can be a subdomain.

members.name: ttl
members.doc: [Time to live](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_to_live) in seconds.

members.name: values
members.doc: DNS record values.

docs.summary: Information about domains connected by nameservers.

members.name: nsRecord
members.doc: Default [nameserver record](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_DNS_record_types#NS).

docs.summary: Information about domains connected by pointing.

members.name: aRecord
members.doc: [Address record](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_DNS_record_types#A).

members.name: cnameRecord
members.doc: [Canonical Name record](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CNAME_record).

members.name: cnameRecords
members.doc: [Canonical Name records](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CNAME_record).

Identical to the domain name including TLD.

members.name: connectedDomainSetupInfo
members.doc: Retrieved setup information.

messages.name: _com_wixpress_premium_domain_connected_GetDomainSetupInfoRequest
messages.displayName: Get Domain Setup Info Request Object

members.name: domain
members.doc: Domain name including TLD

members.name: connectionType
members.doc:
How the domain should be to connected the Wix site.

+ `"UNKNOWN_CONNECTION_TYPE"`: supported only for subdomain.
+ `"POINTING"`: Get domain or subdomain setup by pointing
+ `"NAMESERVERS"`: Get domain setup by nameservers
+ `"HIDDEN"`: supported only for subdomain.

messages.name: _com_wixpress_premium_domain_connected_GetDomainSetupInfoResponse
messages.displayName: Get Domain Setup Info Response Object

members.name: domainSetupInfo
members.doc: Retrieved setup information.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_CONNECTION_TYPE - * Used by sub domain
  • POINTING
  • NAMESERVERS
  • HIDDEN - * internal used by photography company. when a customer creates a photo album, each album has its sub domain and this sub domain is not visible in my domains page.

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_ASSIGNMENT_TYPE
  • PRIMARY
  • REDIRECT

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_DNS_PROPAGATION_STATUS
  • COMPLETED
  • FAILED
  • IN_PROGRESS
